# clawd-mcp

> MCP server and React webapp that bridge Cursor and Claude Desktop to OpenClaw and Moltbook. Uses OpenClaw Gateway and Moltbook API; does not implement or replace them. Alpha.

This repo provides: (1) FastMCP 2.14+ stdio server with tools: agent, sessions, channels, routing, skills, gateway, security, moltbook. (2) React dashboard (port 5180) and FastAPI backend (port 5181) for Startpage, AI/Ollama, Channels, Routes, Diagram, Statistics, Moltbook, Starter page (landing-site generator), Settings. Install: see INSTALL.md. Run MCP: `python -m clawd_mcp`. Run webapp: uvicorn webapp_api + npm run dev in webapp/.

## Core

- [README](https://github.com/sandraschi/clawd-mcp/blob/main/README.md): What this repo is, install pointer, layout, docs
- [INSTALL.md](https://github.com/sandraschi/clawd-mcp/blob/main/INSTALL.md): Pip, webapp (API + frontend), one-shot scripts, config, checks

## MCP & Webapp

- [clawd-mcp tools](https://github.com/sandraschi/clawd-mcp/blob/main/docs/README_CLAWD_MCP_TOOLS.md): MCP server, portmanteau tools
- [Webapp](https://github.com/sandraschi/clawd-mcp/blob/main/docs/README_WEBAPP.md): Dashboard pages, API endpoints, Logger

## External (OpenClaw, Moltbook)

- [OpenClaw](https://github.com/sandraschi/clawd-mcp/blob/main/docs/README_OPENCLAW.md): Platform we use; Gateway, channels
- [Moltbook](https://github.com/sandraschi/clawd-mcp/blob/main/docs/README_MOLTBOOK.md): Social network for agents we use

- [Architecture](https://github.com/sandraschi/clawd-mcp/blob/main/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md): Repo layout, MCP vs API data flow
- [Security](https://github.com/sandraschi/clawd-mcp/blob/main/SECURITY.md): Threats, hardening
